preqs: FIT9131 or FIT5131 or FIT9004 or FIT9017 or equivalentBasic descriptive and inferential statistics, some financial accounting and basic business finance knowledge.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {2402.[5-6], 2411, 2423, 3341.2, 3343, 3348.1, 3349} Do true Otherwise Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT5131, FIT9004, FIT9017, FIT9131} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit provides students with an understanding of the development and use of IT tools and techniques for modelling and decision support in the field of finance. The unit is designed to give students a broad understanding of the financial subsystems confronting business enterprises. The main focus, besides the traditional modelling of finance decision making process using spreadsheet tools, will be IT tools and related techniques that can aid in the analysis and interpretation of real financial problems confronting an enterprise. This unit will look at business related financial issues in the context of specific case studies.
